objects.specification: A wide, flat rectangular floor plane with a smooth, seamless surface and subtle chamfered edges, finished in a neutral light gray tone to provide a stable base for a demo vehicle and comfortable visitor circulation.

A tall, slender vertical wall panel with a smooth, neutral-toned surface and clean rectangular profile, designed to form part of an enclosed booth structure and seamlessly align with adjoining panels.

A full-scale, realistic 3D vehicle model with smooth aerodynamic curves, detailed doors, windows, wheels and trim, finished in a bold, eye-catching color to draw visitor attention.
A modern reception counter with a smooth top surface and clean rectangular form, featuring subtle chamfers on edges and a complementary neutral finish suitable for visitor interactions.
A sleek, vertical display stand with a slender rectangular shaft and flat top surface, finished in a light complementary tone to showcase promotional materials clearly.

A compact, modern small table with a smooth rectangular top and slender legs, finished in a soft complementary tone ideal for visitor seating areas.
